entry.title: Do You Got Room For One More Troubled Soul?
entry.summary:
Author: KuroNekoFe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,514Chapters: 8/15Kudos: 92

Summary: In which Jason and Dick became best friends and fell in love before Bruce took Jason in and when Dick was still Robin. But that doesn't mean that love is ever easy. Dick sighs and shakes his head, exasperated. “So who is he?” he asks. “Some newly orphaned kid, like I was?” “His name is Jason Todd,” Bruce tells him. Dizzying awe abruptly replaces Dick's irritability. A spark of hope lights up his chest. His voice is barely above a whisper as he asks, “Jason?”

entry.summary:
Author: robinspanties (Aslannbg)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,611Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 196

Summary: When Tim Drake was eight years old, he became convinced that the abandoned manor next to his home belonged to a secret family of vampires. entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,463Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 114

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death.It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right.Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: Wolf Transformation
entry.summary:
Author: NorthLiang37

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,396Chapters: 16/17Kudos: 98

Summary: Nightwing transformed into a wolf.——————————————————————————————————————"I suppose this is indeed better than staying up all night," Alfred murmured with a soft sigh. "See you in the morning, boys."Jason drifted in and out of consciousness, hovering between night and day, completely unaware of what had just happened. He turned his head, burying his face in the relatively soft wolf fur, muttering incoherent dreams while clutching the black wolf's foreleg tightly.Sleep, Dick thought. I'll stay here until the end of the world.Even then, he imagined he would still hear his heartbeat pounding against the moon like a drum, synchronized with Jason's. The distance between them would remain this close, even as the vast chaos around them continued to expand endlessly.In the end, love lingered, and all the stories melted into the wind under the scorching sun.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 455,827Chapters: 43/?Kudos: 1,153

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,781Chapters: 4/16Kudos: 47

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. entry.title: Remember to remember me
entry.summary:
Author: Raiinnoise (LaundryBasket____LuLuGal)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,231Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 256

Summary: It starts with Dick forgetting his keys. It’s something Jason easily brushes aside, even when Dick forgets to get groceries and of all things his shoes one day it’s something they can chalk up to stress or lack of sleep. What really gets Jason concerned (not worried) is when Dick casually calls, asking for their apartment number after wandering the street for over an hour.Since the apartment incident Jason’s been paying a lot closer attention. Maybe too close as Dick has commented on.Jason finally decided he’s overreacting…until the night he’s woken up from the sound of glass breaking.ORDick is beginning to have issues with his memory, Jason is there through it all and they realize their relationship goes deeper than either of them thought, memory or not.
